description: Tell the world how you feel with this round magnet! Add instant style to your refrigerator, locker, or cubicle with a design that speaks your mind. Or use this rectangle refrigerator magnet on your dishwasher or fridge to keep your reminders in view. Professionally printed on a 2.5" diameter metal shell with a stretched polyester film/UV protective cover, this magnet is perfect to add to your collection, or to give as a gift for men, women, and students. With CafePress, your satisfaction is always our promise...buy with confidence, as we offer easy returns and exchanges.
